content:
For vote at July 3rd meeting:
14027 enhance+current+disclosure+AuditEvent+so+that+it+explains+what+is+being+recorded+and+why (John Moehrke) Not Related
15659 Provenance+still+has+both+identifier+and+reference+elements (Simone Heckmann) Persuasive
16345 Link+to+obsoleted+version+of+HTTP+specification (Luis Maas) Persuasive
17412 AuditEvent+still+has+both+Identifier+and+Reference (John Moehrke) Persuasive
17413 AuditEvent.source+should+be+a+Reference+not+just+an+Identifier (John Moehrke) Persuasive

Block Vote for July 31 http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=HL7_FHIR_Security_2018-07-31
Balloters
Francois Macary
John Moehrke
Johnathan Coleman
Keith Boone
Line Items
17422 Mandatory+floor+of+TLS+1.2 (Johnathan Coleman) Not Persuasive
16051 Provenance%3A+inconsistant+description+of+the+W3C+model (Francois Macary) Persuasive
17449 signatures.html+should+mention+need+for+input%2C+wiki+page+with+issues%2C+and+point+at+Signature+datatype (John Moehrke) Persuasive
17465 Signature+who%5Bx%5D+and+onBehalfOf%5Bx%5D+can+be+simplified+to+just+Reference+types (John Moehrke) Persuasive
17466 Signature.blob+should+be+a+more+useful+element+name.+Recommend+rename+to+.evidence (John Moehrke) Persuasive
17506 Provenance.agent.type+valueset+needs+HL7+participation+types (John Moehrke) Persuasive
13827 Is+there+something+more+secure+than+%22SHOULD+use+CORS%22 (Keith Boone) Persuasive with Mod
